title: What are the lyrics of the Goa Beach song by Tony Kakkar? - Quora

response.answer_text: Goa Beach Lyrics are written by Tony Kakkar,music given by also Tony Kakkar and song sung by Neha Kakkar & Tony Kakkar.After the success of Ludo,Bijli Ki Taar and Nagin song Tony Kakkar presenting their new amazing song Goa Beach. Dil yeh phisla phisla phislaTere gore badan pe phislaTere gulabi hothon ko dekhMain to pighla pighla pighla Tujhko le jaunga main kheench ke Goa wale beach peRaani aakhein meech keThandi thandi beer piyengeDono photo kheench ke Goa wale beach peRaani aakhein meech keThandi thandi beer piyengeDono photo kheench ke Kheench ke, kheench ke, kheench keAakhein meech ke, aakhein meech keAakhein meech ke haaye haaye Read Full Lyrics Here : Goa Beach Lyrics गोवा बीच - Tony Kakkar | Neha Kakkar

Dill yeh Fisla Fisla Fisla Tere gorey badan pe Fisla Tere gulaabi hothon ko dekh Mein toh pighlaa pighlaa pighlaa Tujhko le jaunga mein kheench key Goa waale beach pey Rani aankhen meenich key Thandii thandii beer peeyenge Dono photo kheench key Goa waale beach pey Rani aankhen meench key Thandii thandii beer peeyenge Dono photo kheench key Kheench key, kheench key, kheench key Aankhen meench key, aankhen meench ke Aankhen meech key... haaye... haaye!
